name: Trojka
description:
On the way to Omsk there are many dangers: bumpy road, wolves and low-hanging branches.

Repair your trojka by dragging a person onto the damaged part, then press the indicated button repeatedly to repair. Multiple persons can repair at once to increase repairspeed.

If the wolves get too close to the trojka, sacrifice a person by dragging up and away from the trojka.
Can you get to Omsk in time?

Press Enter to start the game from the main screen!

This game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 43: Sacrifices must be made

Music by: http://www.jellevanaanholt.nl/
